title: COP26 Bad Even For A Cop, Howard Schultz GETS It Man 11.10.21
itunes:title: COP26 Bad Even For A Cop, Howard Schultz GETS It Man 11.10.21
description:
In episode 1027, Jack and Miles are joined by co-host of Yo Is This Racist Andrew Ti to discuss that COP26- MSM headlines are a disaster, Howard Schultz is BEGGING workers to not unionize…with Holocaust metaphor? Portugal, where it’s illegal for your boss to contact you outside of work hours, Demi Lovato is now a conspiracy influencer… and more!

  1. COP26- MSM headlines are a disaster
  2. Howard Schultz is BEGGING workers to not unionize…with Holocaust metaphor?
  3. Portugal, where it’s illegal for your boss to contact you outside of work hours
  4. Demi Lovato is now a conspiracy influencer…


LISTEN: Yo Is This Racist

LISTEN: The Dress - Dijon

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
